ModMetaData.name: Fallout: Sonora Soundtrack
ModMetaData.description: Before Caesar, the southwest was a different world. Music done by Nobody's Nail Machine and includes both standalone Sonora and its expansion Dayglow. This perfectly blends perfectly to the Mark Morgan Original Soundtrack. Tracks: Casa Grande, City of Flagstaff, City of Phoenix, Collapse, Desert Rangers, Fogbound, Garage City, Ghosts, Jackals, La Cuidad del Sol, Motel, One Way, Out of the World, Out of the World (Alternate), Out-of-Service, Theme, Villa, Bienvenidos a Sonora, Arco Monumental, Dayglow, The Wild One.
ModMetaData.author: karbonpanzer
